Name: Doom Emacs
Purpose & context: Purely as entry point to Org mode/Magit

Name: Flameshot
Purpose & context: Screenshots with very convenient UI for quick editing

Name: Libreoffice
Purpose & context: Quick & dirty editing of truth tables/decision tables and CSV files

Name: Magit
Purpose & context: The best git client. Also see lazygit

Name: Obsidian
Purpose & context: Purely as entry point to Excalidraw

Name: Rofi
Purpose & context: Launcher. Easy to customize. Like fzf but without a terminal in the foreground

Name: Screenkey
Purpose & context: Displays the pressed keys on screen. Useful but not perfect with multiple monitors
